372:4: saddharmaguṇamāhātmyaṃ tena śrutvā sa bhagavān punaḥ|
372:21: ko'nya īdṛkprabhāśrīmān devo vā dānavo'pi vā|
372:22: gandharvo kinnaro vāpi nāgo vā garuḍo'pi vā||
372:25: ityevaṃ cintayan draṣṭuṃ sa vāmanāsuraiḥ saha|
372:27: paśyantaṃ sa balī rājā samīkṣyainaṃ jinātmajam|
372:37: bhavantaṃ ye'pi paśyanti puṇyavanto narā hi te|
372:39: te sattvāḥ sukhino loke pariśuddha vikalmaṣāḥ||
372:44: trātā bhartā śaraṇye'pi nāstyanyo me suhṛdgatiḥ||
372:47: iti saṃprārthya daityendraḥ sa baliḥ sāṃjaliḥ punaḥ|
372:50: tatra taṃ svapure nītvā mahotsavaiḥ pramodanaiḥ|
372:52: tatra taṃ saṃpratiṣṭhāpya rājā saṃmodito baliḥ|
372:63: mūḍhānāṃ ca śucittānāṃ bhava kleśāpaho gatiḥ||
372:76: saṃsāre sarvadā bhadraṃ saukhyaṃ bhoktuṃ yadīcchasi|
372:79: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā ye bhajanti sadā bhave|
372:85: evaṃ vijñāya daityendra saṃbodhiṃ yadi vāṃchasi|
372:89: saddharmān ca sadā śrutvā satkṛtya śraddhayādarāt|
372:90: abhyarcya śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ||
372:91: saddharmaṃ ye sadā śrutvā satkṛtya śraddhayādarāt|
372:119: dehajāni ca lomāni saṃkhyātuṃ śakyate mayā||
372:131: yatsaṃkhyātuṃ pramātuṃ ca śakyate na kadācana||
372:139: evaṃ mahatfalaṃ matvā triratnaṃ sarvadā smaran|
372:140: dhyātvā stutvā praṇatvāpi bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ||
372:141: ye triratnaṃ sadā nityaṃ śraddhayā samupāśritāḥ|
372:153: iti tena jagacchāstā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ|
372:157: bhagavan kīdṛśaṃ karma mūḍhena prakṛtaṃ mayā|
372:158: yenehāpi mayā prāptaṃ bandhanaṃ svajanaiḥ saha||
372:159: hā mayā kudhiyā yajñaṃ tīrthikasaṃmataṃ kṛtam|
372:161: aho bauddheṣu yaddānaṃ prakṛtaṃ tatphalaṃ śubham |
372:173: vāmanaḥ sa mahanmūrttiṃ dhṛtvātiṣṭhat puro mama||
372:176: dehi me yattvayā dattaṃ tṛtīyasya padasya me|
372:177: sthānaṃ na vidyate kutra sthāpayeyamidaṃ vada||
372:178: ekaṃ nyastaṃ mayākāśe dvitīyaṃ ca mahītale||
372:179: tṛtīyaṃ me padaṃ kutra sthāpayethā tdaṃ vada||
372:186: iti satyaṃ mayā proktaṃ śrutvā sa saṃpraharṣitaḥ|
372:196: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ śrutvā tīrthikaśāsanam||
372:198: mayā na śrūyate kvāpi jñāyate naivamuttamam||
372:202: sukṣatre dānasaṃbhūtaṃ naśrutaṃ na mataṃ mayā||
372:204: na jñātaṃ tattriratnānāṃ prābhajiṣyan sadā bhave||
372:212: satkṛtya śraddhayā gauṇyaṃ śrutvā bhajāni sarvadā||
372:213: tathā ya saṃgharatnānāṃ śaraṇe sarvadā sthitaḥ|
372:231: tatkalaṃ śrīmahatsaukhyaṃ dadyān naiva tu saugatam||
372:233: dadasva śraddhayā dānaṃ bauddhaṃ padaṃ yadīcchasi||
372:234: evaṃ datvā sadā dānaṃ bodhicitto jitendriyaḥ|
372:236: vrataṃ vinā na śudhyeta trikāyaṃ mahatāmapi|
372:241: kleśotthito jagadduṣṭaḥ kradho hanti kṣaṇena tat||
372:248: na hi vīryaṃ vinākāryaṃ sidhyate sudhiyāmapi|
372:259: vijñāya tvaṃ sadā sattvahitārthe cara sadvratam||
372:266: iti tena jagacchāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ|
372:268: tataḥ sa balirālokya taṃ lokeśaṃ jinātjam|
372:275: dharmaratnaṃ ca saṃghāṃśca śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi sarvadā||
372:277: dharmeṃ śrutvā ca saṃghānāṃ dāsye yathārhaṃ bhojanam||
372:281: saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalāsya buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇākarāṇām||
372:283: yāvanti puṣpāṇi falāni cauvaṃ bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yānio santi|
372:284: ratnāni yāvanti ca santi loke jalāni ca svacchamanoramāṇi||
372:287: devādilokeṣu ca gandhadhūpāḥ kalpadrumā ratnamayāśca vṛkṣāḥ|
372:294: ato mamārthaya parārthacintā gṛṇantu nāthā idamātmaśaktyā||
372:295: dadāmi cātmānamahaṃ jinebhyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ ca tadātmajebhyaḥ|
372:296: parigrahaṃ me kurutāgrasattvā yuṣmāsu dāsatvamupaimi bhaktyā||
372:298: pūrvaṃ ca pāpaṃ samatikramāmi nānyacca pāpaṃ prakaromi bhūyaḥ||
372:315: yanmayā paśunā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritameva vā||
372:328: apriyā na bhaviṣyanti bhaviṣyanti na me priyāḥ|
372:329: ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati||
372:342: puṇyamekaṃ tadā trāṇaṃ mayā tatraiva saṃcitam||
372:352: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tasmin sthāne mahābhaye||
372:363: adyaiva maraṇaṃ naiti na yukta me sukhāsikā|
372:364: avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi kasmānme susthinaṃ manaḥ||
372:368: ekākī kvāpi yāsyāmi kiṃ me sarvaiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ||
372:370: iyameva tu me cintā yuktā rātraṃdivaṃ sadā|
372:372: mayā duṣṭena mūḍhena yatpāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ purā|
372:387: ityukte balinā tena lokeśvaro niśamya niśamya saḥ|
372:388: sādhu sādhviti saṃrādhya taṃ baliṃ caivamabravīt||
372:390: yadi nātra vicintyate hitaṃ punarapyeṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ||
372:391: rātrau yathā meghaghanāndhakāre vidyutkṣaṇaṃ darśayati prakāśam|
372:392: buddhānubhāvena tathā kadācillokasya puṇyeṣu matiḥkṣaṇaṃ syāt||
372:393: tasmācchubhaṃ durbalameva nityaṃ balaṃ tu pāpasya mahatsughoram|
372:394: tajjīyate'yena śubhena kena saṃbodhicittaṃ yadi nāma na syāt||
372:399: bahusaukhyaśatāni bhoktukāmairna vimocyaṃ hi sadaiva bodhicittam||
372:400: bhavacārakabandhano varo kaḥ sugatānāṃ suta ucyate kṣaṇena|
372:406: kadalīva falaṃ vihāya yāti kṣayamanyatkuśalaṃ hi sarvameva|
372:407: satataṃ falati kṣayaṃ na yāti prasavatyeva hi bodhicittavṛkṣaḥ||
372:430: tṛptaṃ sarvasukhaiḥ kuryāt sarvāḥ pīḍāśchinatti ca||
372:432: kuto vā tādṛśaṃ mitraṃ puṇyaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ kutaḥ||
372:435: iti mantrayatau jinasya putre kaluṣaṃ svahṛdaye karoti yaḥ|
372:437: atha yasya manaḥ prasādameti prasavettasya tato'dhikaṃ falam||
372:441: nādya cet kriyate yatnaṃ talenāpi talaṃ vrajeḥ||
372:443: eatān sarvān visaṃvādya kā gatiste bhaviṣyati||
372:444: manasā cintayitvā tu yo na dadyāt punarnaraḥ|
372:450: ekasyāpi hi sattvasya hitaṃ hitvā hato bhavet|
372:457: yadā kuśalayogyo'pi kuśalaṃ tvaṃ karoṣi na|
372:463: yadīdṛśaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prāpya punaḥ sīdasi mohitaḥ|
372:465: ciraṃ dhakṣyati te kāyam nārakāgni suduḥsahaḥ|
372:468: na śurā naiva te prājñāḥ kathaṃ dāsīkṛto'si taiḥ||
372:470: atra te cetanā nāsti mantrairiva vimohitaḥ||
372:471: sarve devā manuṣyāśca yadi syustava śatravaḥ|
372:476: mativeśmani lobhayan jale yadi tiṣṭhanti kuta sukhaṃ tava||
372:478: mahārthasiddhyai tu samudyatasya duḥkhāni kasmāttava bādhakāni||
372:480: śītātapādivyasanaṃ sahante jagaddhitārtham sahase kathaṃ na||
372:484: ye mocayanti bandhāttvāṃ dveṣasteṣu katham tava||
372:486: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate||
372:495: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate||
372:504: mithyā kalpanayā citte pāpāt kāye vyathā yataḥ|
372:507: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā||
372:508: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ|
372:526: anyacca kāryaṃ kālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tattanasādhitam||
372:532: māni śatruṃ vaśaṃ neti mānaśatruvaśāstu te||
372:533: mānena durgatiṃ nītā mūrkhā durdarśanāḥ kṛśāḥ|
372:535: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrāḥ
372:542: yena janmasahasrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ||
372:543: avaśyaṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati|
372:544: naca tṛpyati dṛṣṭvāpi pūrvad bādhyate tṛṣā||
372:549: bālaiḥ sa bhāgacarito niyataṃ yāti durgatim|
372:554: hitamuktāḥ prakupyanti vārayanti ca te hitāt|
372:555: atha na śrūyate teṣāṃ kupitā yānti durgatim||
372:560: tasmāt prājño na tāmicchedicchāto jāyate bhayam|
372:567: na ca pāpamakīrttirvā yadarthaṃ gaṇitā purā||
372:571: prakāmaṃ saṃpariṣvajya kiṃ na gacchati nirvṛtim||
372:574: yadi na te'śucau rāgaḥ kasmādāliṃgase param|
372:586: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirupyatām||
372:589: evaṃ śūnyeṣu bhāveṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet|
372:590: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati||
372:591: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam|
372:592: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamānā svabhāvataḥ||
372:593: vicāre jīvaloke hi ko nāmātra mariṣyate|
372:594: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt||
372:616: snātvā snātvā yathā kaścidviśed vahniṃ muhurmuhuḥ|
372:628: yasyaiva śravaṇāt trāsastaireva na vinā ratiḥ||
372:629: ātmānaṃ ca parāṃścaiva yaḥ śīghra trātumicchati|
372:640: yadi dāsyāmi kiṃ bhojye ityātmārthe piśācatā|
372:648: ye kecidduġkhitā loke sarve te svasukhecchayā|
372:652: na nāmasādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ saṃsāre'pi kutaḥ sukham|
372:654: āstām tāvatparo loko dṛṣṭo'pyartho na sidhyati|
372:658: upadravā ye ca bhavanti loke yāvanti duḥkhāni bhayāni caiva|
372:669: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ|
372:671: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśrūte|
372:672: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ dvesaśalye hṛdi sthite||
372:677: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti durjanā gaganopamāḥ|
372:680: dahatyātmānamevādau paraṃ dhakṣyati vā na vā||
372:684: kodhaṃ yo hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca||
372:688: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim||
372:694: īdṛśāḥ prayayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhava||
372:696: yena yāsyanti narakān tvayaiva te hatā nanu||
372:698: etānāśritya te pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamatā bahu|
372:702: evaṃ budhvā tu sattveṣu kṣāntiṃ dhṛtvā śubhe cara|
372:705: na balārthaṃ na cārogyena ca kāyasukhāya te|
372:712: puṇye vighnaḥ kṛto'nenetyatra ko yo na yujyate|
372:713: kṣāntyā samaṃ tapo nāsti na tvetattadupasthitam||
372:717: na ca prāvrājake prāpte pravrajya bighna ucyate||
372:730: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ||
372:736: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam||
372:741: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrā yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ ca praviśanti manyum|
372:745: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo'sti|
372:746: dṛśyante ete nanu sattvarupāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro'tra||
372:753: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīryaṃ bodhiryataḥ sthitā|
372:754: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vina gatiḥ||
372:757: naivāsti tajjagati vastu vicintyamānaṃ nāpnuyādyadiha vīryarathādhiruḍhaḥ||
372:759: hatvā ripūn jayamanuttamamāpnuvanti viṣṇurjitaṃ tadaha vīryamahāhaṭasya||
372:766: yaddevo viyati vimānbavāsino ye nirdvandvāḥ samanubhavanti saumanasyam|
372:769: bodhyaṃgadānaṃ pradiśanti sadbhyo dhyānaṃ hi tatra pravadanti hetum||
372:772: prajñādhanena vikalaṃ tu narasya rupamālekhya rupamiva sāravihīnamantaḥ|
372:775: jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadā doṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām||
372:776: ādeṣṭya cendriyāṇāṃ paramanujamano vetti sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ|
372:778: kāryārṇave vāpi dṛḍhaṃ nimagnāḥ saṃgrāmamadhye manujāḥ pradhānāḥ|
372:779: prajñāvaśātte vijayaṃ labhante prajñā hyataḥ sā śubhahetubhūtā||
372:781: na prajñā vikalā vibhānti puruṣāḥ prātāḥpradīpā iva||
372:782: svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍeva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām|
372:783: jñātvā bhavasva hitasādhanatatparastvaṃ kuryā ataḥ satatameva śubhe prayatnam||
372:789: yā avasthāḥ prapadyante svayaṃ paravaśo'pi vā|
372:790: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ||
372:791: na hī tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ|
372:792: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ||
372:799: ākṛtaṃ kiṃ mayā nātha yajñaṃ tīrthikasammatam|
372:800: yasyeha falaṃ bhuṃjāno vasāmyatra janaiḥ saha||
372:814: evaṃ stutvā sa daityendro lokanāthaṃ tamīśvaram|
372:816: rakṣa māṃ durmatiṃ nātha samuddhara bhavodadheḥ|
372:821: kṛtāṃjaliḥ sadā smṛtvā namāmi śaraṇe sthitaḥ||
372:822: yacca dharmaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ jagaddhite|
372:825: tānapyahaṃ sadā smṛtvā bhajāni śaraṇe sthitaḥ||
372:826: evaṃ tadbhajanaṃ kṛtvā yanmayā sādhitaṃ śubham|
372:828: glānānāmasmi bhaiajyaṃ bhaveyaṃ vaidya eva ca|
372:836: sarvatyāgaśca nirvāṇaṃ nirvānārthi ca me manaḥ|
372:837: tyaktavyaṃ cenmayā sarvaṃ varaṃ sattveṣu dīyate||
372:839: ghnantu nindantu vā nityamākirantu ca pāṃśubhiḥ||
372:840: krīḍantu mama kāyena hasantu vilasantu ca|
372:843: kārayantu ca karmāṇi yāni teṣāṃ sukhāvahe|
372:845: yeṣāṃ kruddhā prasannā vā māmālambya matirbhavet|
372:846: sa eva teṣāṃ hetuḥ syānnityaṃ sarvārthasiddhaye||
372:847: atyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye'pyapakāriṇaḥ|
372:850: pārepsunāṃ ca naubhūtaḥ setuḥ saṃkrama eva ca||
372:862: tadvadeva ca tāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣisyāmi yathākramam||
372:863: adya me safalaṃ janma sulabdhāḥ sārasaṃpadaḥ|
372:880: jagadadya mayā nimantritaṃ sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā|
372:884: ārādhanā yādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmana dāsamupaimi loke|
372:885: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ||
372:892: ko vā tvaṃ praṇipatya sāndrakaruṇāṃ prahlāditādhyāśayaṃ
372:896: na tvevaikapi kṣaṇaṃ surapure saṃbuddhaśūnye jagatyu-
372:898: tadyāvanna patati sarva eva loko durdṛṣṭivratavivṛte pramādakūpe
372:912: na śikṣā rakṣituṃ śakyā calaṃ cittamarakṣatā||
372:913: adāntā mattamātaṃgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām|
372:917: vyāghrāḥ sihāṃ gajā ṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ sarve ca śatravaḥ|
372:924: cittādeva hi sarvatra bhayaṃ bhadraṃ ca jāyate||
372:926: taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāśca tā striyaḥ||
372:933: dānapāramitā proktā tasmāt sā cittameva hi||
372:938: bhūmiṃ chādayituṃ sarvāṃ kutaḥ carma bhaviṣyati|
372:940: bāhyā bhāvāstathā sarvā na śakyā vārayituṃ kvacit|
372:946: duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ bhramanti te mudhāmbare|
372:952: lābhā naśyantu te kāmaṃ satkāraḥ kāyajīvitam|
372:953: naśyatvanyacca kuśalaṃ mā tu cittaṃ kadācana||
372:995: pramātuṃ śakyate naiva mayaikena kathaṃ khalu||
372:998: yadyevaṃ carase rājan kvāpi na durgatiṃ vrajeḥ|
372:1000: svaparātmahitaṃ kṛtvā bhuktvā saukhyaṃ sadā bhaveḥ|
372:1070: mayā te hitamākhyātaṃ budhvā dhartuṃ yadīcchasi||
372:1082: tadā tasya suhatatrātā kaścideko'pi naiva hi|
372:1084: tataḥ sa yamadūtena badhvā saṃtarjya neṣyate|
372:1085: tatra paśyan sa sarvatra sarvān duṣṭān bhayaṃkarān||
372:1088: tān dṛṣṭvā sa paritrasto vikalo dīnamānasaḥ|
372:1106: avaśyaṃ yatkṛtaṃ karma bhogyameva hi tatfalam||
372:1107: yattvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatfalaṃ bhuktamatra hi|
372:1108: yadi na prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ bhuṃjyānaivātra tatfalam||
372:1109: dharmaste vidyate naiva tattrātā nātra kaścana|
372:1114: adattamapi cāhṛtya bhuktam dravyaṃ tvayā balāt||
372:1117: paiśunyavacasā bhedaṃ suhṛdāṃ ca kṛtaṃ tvayā|
372:1133: śīlaṃ te vidyate naiva kiṃcidapi ca saṃyame|
372:1139: satkāraṃ bhajanaṃ naiva kiṃcidapi kṛtaṃ tvayā||
372:1141: smṛtvā nāma gṛhītvāpi na hi saṃsādhitaṃ śubham||
372:1142: saddharmabhāṣitaṃ kvāpi śrutaṃ tvayā kadāpi na|
372:1143: sāṃghikānāṃ ca satkāraṃ kṛtaṃ nāpi kadācana||
372:1144: dharmagaṇḍīninādaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā kadāpi na|
372:1145: kiṃcidapi na te dharme mano'bhilaṣate kvacit||
372:1146: tenātra dāruṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ tvayāptaṃ sāmprataṃ dhruvam|
372:1147: yenaiva yatkṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhujyate falam||
372:1148: iti tairgaditaṃ śrutvā sa pāpī paritāpitaḥ|
372:1149: teṣāṃ puro rudannaivaṃ brūyācca niḥśvasan śanaiḥ||
372:1154: iti tatprārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te yamakiṃkarāḥ|
372:1155: taṃ badhvā yamarājasya purataḥ sahasā nayet||
372:1158: kimatra me upānītaḥ pāpiṣṭho'yaṃ hi durmatiḥ|
372:1161: yatra karmafalaṃ bhogyaṃ tatrainaṃ nayata drutam||
372:1163: iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te yamakinnarāḥ|
372:1168: tathāpi taṃ mahāduṣṭaṃ jīvantaṃ taṃ samīkṣya te|
372:1170: tathāpi jīvito naiva tyajet prāṇaṃ sa kilviṣī|
372:1174: tena tasya mukhamoṣṭhau jihvā dantā ca kaṇṭhakam|
372:1179: sarve te pāpino duṣṭā bhuṃjante narake vyathām||
372:1180: kaścittrātā tadā teṣāṃ nāstyeva tatra nārake|
372:1185: duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ kartavyaṃ puṇyameva hi||
372:1186: puṇyena jāyate kvāpi durgatau na kadācana|
372:1190: suśīlo saṃyamī dhīraḥ kṣāntimān vīryavān balī|
372:1220: ityevaṃ prārthine tena balinā sa jagatprabhuḥ|
372:1223: nāhaṃ sadātra tiṣṭheyaṃ bahu kāryaṃ mamāsti hi|
372:1228: tattvaṃ yathā parijñātaṃ tathā kṛtvā samāhitaḥ|
372:1229: bodhicaryāvrataṃ dhṛtvā sukhaṃ cara sadā śubhe||
372:1230: iti śāstā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa balirādarāt|
372:1239: tathā bodhivrataṃ dhṛtvā prācaranta sadā śubhe||
